Class LegoMindstormsEv3Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsEv3Base
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothConnectionListener, Component, Deleteable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ev3Commands, Ev3Motors, Ev3Sound, Ev3UI, LegoMindstormsEv3Sensor

    public class LegoMindstormsEv3Base
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements BluetoothConnectionListener, Component, Deleteable
    The base class for EV3 components.
    Author:
    jerry73204@gmail.com (jerry73204), spaded06543@gmail.com (Alvin Chang)
